page.title: 11LOCAL INFORMATION & NEWS
page.content: information centre. Interviews with two borrowers on 10.7.85 produced the following information.Mr. Moore came to the library once a week.He had been coming since this new library opened and likes spy and adventure stories Mrs. Anderson brings her play group aged child to the children's section for books. Her own tastes include autobiographies and historical novels. She visits the library once every three weeks.Both interviewees said that Totley was a pleasant area to live in, especially because of its nearness to beautiful countryside and its 'village' atmosphere. Another source of {local information } is {THE TOTLEY INDEPENDENT. } This monthly journal is sold in the library which also keeps earlier issues.The local newsagents sell it too.
